The goddesses glory: or, The loyal lover wounded by their splendid beauty To the tune of, Walking beneath the shades. This may be printed, R.P.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : music
Printed for J. Deacon at the Angel in Gilt-Spur-Street, without Newgate, [London] : [1695?]
Verse - "When the soft winds did blow". Two lines of printed music at head of text. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
